entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:55 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
